docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. What is choin? Choin is a clear and concise reward system to be used in AkiraChix to ensure that student deserving awards are rewarded fairly. The following are the documents will be required for the documentation of the project: Product documentation We need the product documentation to document all the system documents and users documents. For system documentation we will have to document user design experience document,testing document amd help and maintanance documents. User documentation We need the user documentation to document end-user guides and system admin guide. It will give users the For end-user document: This will be providing information about the product. Also, this is often referred to as user assistance. It gives a detailed overview of the product with all the services offered by the product. The users are trainers and students. System admin document: Will be defining procedures for starting and shutting down systems, monitoring performance, installing programs and operating system updates.Set up user types privileges, setting user permissions and passwords.Schedule database maintenance, moving databases backup and restores.Create security procedures, guidelines, passwords. Process documentation We will have the process documentation to enable us keep track of the development plan, have estimated time and requirements, schedules, reports and metrics of the product and lastly the standards of the product.
